post_title: WTT: Griffith Portrait for different HOFer
post_content:
Does anyone want to trade for this Clark Griffith (portrait) Pied 150 back in an SGC 1.5? In return I am looking for a similarly regarded HOF from the following list:

Miller Huggins (hands at mouth) 
Elmer Flick
Fred Clarke (portrait)
Iron Man McGinnity 
Joe Kelley
Roger Bresnahan (with bat)
Rube Marquard (pitching or hands at thighs)
Vic Willis (throwing or with bat)

Would be open to other offers. Thanks in advance.

A quick post trade shout out....

Cmvorce & I traded HOF'ers and I ended up very pleased with our trade

He packaged the Griffith extremely carefully and well. If anyone is looking to do future purchasing or trading from him... you will be well taken care of!

Great job Cmvorce- I'll be excited the next time a trade opportunity from you comes up!

Matt Galvin
Appreciate it, Matt. I’ll say the same for you. (And thanks for the Iron Man)
